```{r Setup}
library(diprate)
```

### Using Clayton's data assembly


```{r}
d <- read.csv("../data/LumandCellCounts_20210330_parsed.csv", as.is=TRUE, row.names = 1)
colnames(d) <- gsub("TotHour_Image",'time',colnames(d))
colnames(d) <- gsub("_", '.', colnames(d), fixed=TRUE)
d$uid <- paste(d$cell.line, d$well, d$plate.name, sep="_")
```

#### Change column names to standard
```{r}
by_plate <- lapply(unique(d$Barcode), function(bc) d[d$Barcode==bc & d$drug1.conc==0,])
by_plate <- lapply(by_plate, function(x) x[order(x$well,x$time),])
```

```{r fig.height=8.5, fig.width=11}
prepMultiGCplot()
invisible(lapply(seq_along(by_plate), function(i) do.call(plotGC, append(getGCargs(by_plate[[i]]),
                                                                        list(leg=FALSE,main=unique(by_plate[[i]]$cell.line))))))
```
